title: The Interview, the 180 rule

Mathematics, Science & Technology/Video tape recorders and recording
description: Episode number 8 of Series "Video tech". This program focusses on the television interview. It analyses camera position, the use of light, shot composition, and also the questions - what to ask, when to ask and how to ask! It also includes other important points to remember, such as backcuts, noddies and not crossing the line.
